languages.text: "Расслабься, старик. Иногда полезно походить по нижним палубам. Посмотреть, чем простой люд живет".
"Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."
languages.original_text: "Расслабься, старик. Иногда полезно походить по нижним палубам. Посмотреть, чем простой люд живет".

traits.locale_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “别紧张，老家伙。偶尔来下层甲板走走对你有好处，你可以看看普通人都是怎么生活的。”
languages.original_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."

traits.locale_text: “别紧张，老家伙。偶尔来下层甲板走走对你有好处，你可以看看普通人都是怎么生活的。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Tranquilo, abuelo. Dar una vuelta por las cubiertas inferiores de vez en cuando viene muy bien; ayuda a entender cómo vive la gente sencilla».
languages.original_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."

traits.locale_text: «Tranquilo, abuelo. Dar una vuelta por las cubiertas inferiores de vez en cuando viene muy bien; ayuda a entender cómo vive la gente sencilla».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「落ち着きなさい、ご老人。たまには下甲板層を散歩するのもいいものよ。素朴な人々の暮らしを見ることができるわ」
languages.original_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着きなさい、ご老人。たまには下甲板層を散歩するのもいいものよ。素朴な人々の暮らしを見ることができるわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Entspannt Euch, alter Mann. Ab und an einen Spaziergang auf den unteren Decks zu machen, ist gut für Euch. So seht Ihr, wie die einfachen Leute leben."
languages.original_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."

traits.locale_text: "Entspannt Euch, alter Mann. Ab und an einen Spaziergang auf den unteren Decks zu machen, ist gut für Euch. So seht Ihr, wie die einfachen Leute leben."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Relax, le vieux. Une petite balade sur les ponts inférieurs ne peut pas faire de mal. Ça permet de voir comment vivent les gens ordinaires. »
languages.original_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."

traits.locale_text: « Relax, le vieux. Une petite balade sur les ponts inférieurs ne peut pas faire de mal. Ça permet de voir comment vivent les gens ordinaires. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Rahatla ihtiyar. Arada sırada aşağı güvertelerde yürüyüş yapmak sana iyi gelir. Sıradan insanların nasıl yaşadığını görürsün."
languages.original_text: "Relax, old man. Going for a stroll on the lower decks every once in a while is good for you. Lets you see how the simple folk live."
